text: 14.23 Tat 1.15 Bɨ olap pen tap ogɨnap gos pal lɨlɨg ñɨŋɨnɨmuŋ ak, God nɨgek takaw mɨŋel ak ne dɨnɨmuŋ. Taynen? Klays nop gos lɨnɨgɨlɨg ma ñɨŋub, gos pal lɨlɨg ñɨŋub ak nɨm, God nɨgek takaw mɨŋel anɨb ak ne dɨnɨmuŋ. Chɨn tap olap gɨnɨgabun ak pen, Klays nop gos lɨnɨgɨlɨg ma gonɨgabun, anɨb ak tap si tap tɨmel gɨnɨgabun.
